name: Bricks vs Ball
description:
A casual game made in Construct 3.

Your goal is to aim the red ball to hit the bricks and keep them from reaching the top of the level. The number in the brick represents how many times you have to hit it with the ball to destroy it. The longer you go, the tougher the bricks become.

Collect the random coins while playing and when you collect 20 you can cash them in for a continue game and maybe beat your high score.

Simple, casual fun designed to give you a zen moment.
